charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] came across
some Trainers running away from the glaciers.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_0200_: Waaaaah! I can’t do this anymore!
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_0400_: Oh my—both of you are exhausted already?
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_0500_:
That’s not enough to become a Gym Trainer at
my Gym!
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_0600_: We’d only just started. They lack tenacity.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_0700_:
Hmm? Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Are you here to train, too?
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_0301_0800_: Yes! I’m gonna do my best!
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_0302_1000_: Yes! But it’s kind of cold...
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_0402_1100_: That’s what makes it so great!
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_1200_:
Ever since I arrived on Pasio, I’ve been
training here every day.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_1300_:
Training in a harsh environment will make us
even stronger.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_1400_:
Thanks to that, I think I’ve become even more
disciplined than before.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_1500_:
I want to teach everyone on Pasio what
a severe battle truly is.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_1600_:
Of course, I’m thinking of teaching you
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_0401_1800_: That’s an answer I like to hear!
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_0402_2000_: I’m not going to hold anything back, you know.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_2100_:
Anyways, when I see a young Trainer with
potential like you, I remember my son.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_2300_:
I trained Lapras so I could eventually pass her on
to him.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_2400_:
But instead of becoming an Ice-type Trainer,
Gordie chose Rock type.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_2500_:
We had a huge fight when I found out. It was
quite a mess.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_2600_: Ever since, I haven’t talked to Gordie much.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_0401_2800_: Well, we did fight, but we don’t hate each other.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_0402_3000_: But I don’t really mind it much now.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_3100_:
Plus, if that’s what he’s decided, I don’t plan to
deny the path he’s chosen.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_3200_:
But as his mum—and his coach—I do think about
some things.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_3300_:
I’m planning to train a talented Ice-type Trainer
and have them battle Gordie.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_3400_: But I haven’t found the right Trainer yet.
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_3600_:
Would you be interested in becoming an Ice-type
Trainer?
charaepi_ch0255_00_melon/2301_1201_3700_:
It’ll be fine! The training might be hard at first,
but you’ll gradually learn to enjoy the chilling
freeze of ice.
